article_title: Make Population Health A Brand Strategy To Capture Multicultural Consumers And Improve Outcomes

article_metadata.description: Leaders and their businesses will be hearing more and more about “Population Health” in the immediate future as it applies to the health of the public as a whole and as a brand strategy to solve for inequities in the workplace and marketplace. In fact, there are Population Health executives at Fortune 500 companies who are responsible for managing the healthcare, wellness, work/life balance, and other related needs of their employees and addressing similar needs in their businesses’ consumer base. Simply put, companies are learning that well-being (healthy minds, bodies, and careers) amongst employees and customers is essential to sustained success in all part of their business – especially when it comes to multicultural engagement and career advancement.
article_metadata.author: Glenn Llopis
